Name: Verbs & Nouns
checklistText:
Verbs:
        04 - Display current Noun in Registers formatted as octal (0-7 numbering)
        06 - Display current Noun in Registers formatted as decimal (0-9 numbering)
        16 - Monitor (Continuously update) current Noun in Registers formatted as decimal
        21 - Manually enter data into R1, Noun determines data being edited, ENTR commits changes to system memory
        22 - Manually enter data into R2, Noun determines data being edited, ENTR commits changes to system memory
        23 - Manually enter data into R3, Noun determines data being edited, ENTR commits changes to system memory
        24 - Executes Verb 21 and 22 in sequence
        25 - Executes Verb 21, 22, and 23 in sequence
        34 - Terminate function (Clear Noun, Verb, Registers from DSKY)
    
    Extended Verbs:
        45 - Reset Surface Flag
        46 - Guidance & Navigation autopilot
        47 - Move LM state vector into CM state vector
        48 - Request DAP Data Load
        49 - Begin automatic attitude maneuver
        50 - Please perform
        66 - Move current vehicle state vector to connected vehicle
        75 - EMG liftoff program
        78 - Update Prelaunch Azimuth
        83 - Request orbit parameter
        96 - Terminate current program/State vector integration and go immidiately to Prog 00
        99 - Request enable engine ignition

    Nouns:
        14 - Target dV for TLI burn
            R1: VC/O XXXXX ft/s
        
        17 - Current attitude
            R1: Roll    XXX.xx deg
            R2: Pitch   XXX.xx deg
            R3: Yaw     XXX.xx deg

        18 - Desired attitude
            R1: Roll    XXX.xx deg
            R2: Pitch   XXX.xx deg
            R3: Yaw     XXX.xx deg

        20 - Current IMU attitude
            R1: Roll(OG)    XXX.xx deg
            R2: Pitch(IG)   XXX.xx deg
            R3: Yaw(MG)     XXX.xx deg
        
        22 - Desired IMU attitude
            R1: Roll(OG)    XXX.xx deg
            R2: Pitch(IG)   XXX.xx deg
            R3: Yaw(MG)     XXX.xx deg

        25 - Checklist Item, Only used with Verb 50
            R1: 00XXX
            R2: -----
            R3: -----

        29 - XSM launch azimuth
            R1: Azimuth XXX.xx deg
            R2:         -----
            R3:         -----

        32 - Time to Perigee/Perilune (Pe)
            R1: 00XXX   hours
            R2: 000XX   minutes
            R3: 0XX.xx  seconds

        33 - Time of Ignition (Mission Time) (GETI)
            R1: 00XXX   hours
            R2: 000XX   minutes
            R3: 0XX.xx  seconds

        34 - Time of Event (Mission Time)
            R1: 00XXX   hours
            R2: 000XX   minutes
            R3: 0XX.xx  seconds

        35 - Time till Event
            R1: 00XXX   hours
            R2: 000XX   minutes
            R3: 0XX.xx  seconds
        
        36 - AGC Mission Elapsed Time
            R1: 00XXX   hours
            R2: 000XX   minutes
            R3: 0XX.xx  seconds
        
        38 - Time of State Vector being integrated
            R1: 00XXX   hours
            R2: 000XX   minutes
            R3: 0XX.xx  seconds

    Mixed Nouns:
        40
            R1: Time from ignition/cutoff (TFI/TFC)     XXbxx min/sec 
            R2: VG                                      XXXX.x ft/s
            R3: Delta v (Accumulated)                   XXXX.x ft/s
        
        42
            R1: Apocenter altitude  XXXX.x nmi
            R2: Pericenter altitude XXXX.x nmi
            R3: Required Dv        XXXX.x ft/s
        
        44
            R1: Apocenter altitude  XXXX.x nmi
            R2: Pericenter altitude XXXX.x nmi
            R3: TFF                 XXbxx min/sec

        45
            R1: (VHF/optics)                      XXbxx marks
            R2: Time from ignition of next burn XXbxx min/sec
            R3: Middle gimbal angle             XXX.xx deg

        46 - DAP Configuration
            R1: Flags (Octal)
            R2: Flags (Octal)
            R3: -----
        
        47 - Craft Weight
            R1: CSM XXXXX lbs
            R2: LM  XXXXX lbs
            R3:     -----
        
        48 - Gimbal Trim
            R1: Pitch   XXX.xx deg
            R2: Yaw     XXX.xx deg
            R3:         -----

        60
            R1: GMAX XXX.xx g
            R2: VPRED XXXXX ft/s
            R3: GAMMA EI XXX.xx deg (+above)
        
        61 - Impact location
            R1: Lat             +/- XXX.xx (+ = North)
            R2: Lon             +/- XXX.xx (+ = East)
            R3: Heads Up/Down   +/- 00001
        
        62
            R1: Inertial velocity magnitude XXXXX ft/s
            R2: Altitude rate               XXXXX ft/s
            R3: Altitude above pad radius   XXXX.x nmi

        63
            R1: Range from EI altitude to splash XXXX.x nmi
            R2: Predicted Inertial velocity XXXXX ft/s
            R3: Time of EI altitude XXbxx min/sec
        
        64
            R1: Drag Acceleration XXX.xx g
            R2: Inertial velocity XXXXX ft/s
            R3: Range to Splash XXXX.x nmi (+ is overshoot)
        
        66
            R1: Commanded bank angle    XXX.xx deg
            R2: Crossrange error        XXXX.x nmi (+ south)
            R3: Downrange error         XXXX.x nmi (+ overshoot)
        
        67
            R1: Range to Target XXXX.x nmi (+ overshoot)
            R2: Current Lat     XXX.xx deg (+ north)
            R3: Current Lon     XXX.xx deg (+ east)
        
        68
            R1: Commanded bank angle    XXX.xx deg
            R2: Inertial velocity       XXXXX ft/s
            R3: Altitude rate           XXXXX ft/s
        
        69
            R1: Commanded bank angle    XXX.xx deg
            R2: Drag level              XXX.xx g
            R3: Exit velocity           XXXXX ft/s

        74
            R1: Commanded bank angle    XXX.xx deg
            R2: Inertial velocity       XXXXX ft/s
            R3: Drag acceleration       XXX.xx g
        
        81
            R1: Delta VX (LV)   XXXX.x ft/s
            R2: Delta VY (LV)   XXXX.x ft/s
            R3: Delta VZ (LV)   XXXX.x ft/s

        95
            R1: TFI XXbxx min/sec   (Countdown to Ignition)
            R2: VG  XXXXX ft/s      (Remaining ft/s dV in burn)
            R3: VI  XXXXX ft/s      (Current craft velocity)
